info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 7 at 2:47PM EDT until July 8 at 2:02AM EDT by NWS Blacksburg VA
info.description:
...Observed flooding changed to Minor severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Virginia...
Dan River at South Boston affecting Halifax County.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring.
* WHERE...Dan River at South Boston.
* WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight.
* IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Water approaches Highway 501 between Route 58 and the Dan River.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM EDT Monday the stage was 22.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 18.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:00 PM EDT Monday was 22.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is currently near crest just above flood stage, and is expected to recede back below flood stage by early evening. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 22.0 feet on 01/25/2017. - For flooding safety information, please visit http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Also, caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued late tonight at 215 AM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT
